articles.title: Own an Android phone? Google has pledged to keep your device updated for even longer - Express
articles.description: IF YOU'RE using an Android smartphone, you'll be chuffed to learn that Google has announced plans to support your handset for longer than ever before, meaning you'll be protected against malware and gain access to the latest features.

articles.author: Aaron Brown
articles.title: Amazon Fire TV confirms some huge news that its rivals won’t like - Express
articles.description: DAYS after pushing out one of the biggest changes to its Fire TV experience, Amazon has announced that its streaming platform has hit a staggering new milestone.
